Articles.Content:
I recently upgraded my PC.  ...and have started to put some visual mods back.

In particular, I've installed:

  • Scatterer
  • EVE
  • Texture Replacer

I notice that I'm seeing runway light polygons after installing the above.

Anyone know what settings I might be able to change to make these go away?

I did notice that Scatterer was not recognized as compatible by CKAN and says it only works with 1.8.0 but I figured I'd give it a shot in 1.8.1 anyway.
